question: What is the name of the Information and Communication technology based multi-modal platform for governance, chaired by the Prime Minister?
explanation:
Prime Minister Narendra Modi recently chaired the 32nd PRAGATI interaction to discuss the progress of several projects. The interaction was made through PRAGATI - the multi-modal platform for ‘Pro-Active Governance and Timely Implementation’, which involves the participation of Central and state governments.
Prime Minister had launched the Information and communication technology based multi-modal governance platform PRAGATI on March 2015. PRAGATI is an interactive platform chaired by the Prime Minister to review and monitor important projects of the Centre and various State governments.
